get.summary: Query details of the requested automation compositions
get.description: Queries details of the requested automation compositions, returning all composition details

post.description: Commissions automation composition definitions, returning the automation composition IDs

put.description: Updates automation composition definitions, returning the updated composition definition IDs

delete.description: Deletes a automation composition, returning optional error details

put.summary: Issue a command to the requested automation compositions
put.description: Issues a command to an automation composition, ordering a state change on the composition

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: Entity Body of automation composition command

get.summary: Query details of the requested automation compositions
get.description: Queries details of requested automation compositions, returning all automation composition details

post.description: Saves instance properties, returning the saved instances properties and it's version

put.description: Updates instance properties, returning the saved instances properties and it's version

delete.summary: Delete a automation composition and instance properties
delete.description: Deletes a automation composition and instance properties, returning optional error details

get.summary: Query priming details of the requested automation compositions
get.description: Queries priming details of requested automation compositions, returning primed/deprimed compositions
